#summary How to install MSYS shell environment for Windows

MSYS is a collection of GNU utilities to build applications and programs which depend on UNIX. Before the installation of MSYS, [InstallingMinGWForWindows MinGW] must be intalled in _C:/MinGW_.

 # The components of MSYS can be downloaded from [http://sourceforge.net/ SourceForge Web] in Page _MinGW - Minimalist GNU for Windows_ project, [http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=2435&package_id=24963 MSYS Base System package]:
  * bash (bash-3.1-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2)
  * bzip2 (bzip2-1.0.3-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2)
  * coreutils (coreutils-5.97-MSYS-1.0.11-snapshot.tar.bz2)
  * cpmake (cpmake-3.81-MSYS-1.0.11-1-bin.tar.gz)
  * csmake (csmake-3.81-MSYS-1.0.11-2.tar.bz2)
  * diffutils (diffutils-2.8.7-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2)
  * findutils (findutils-4.3.0-MSYS-1.0.11-3-bin.tar.gz)
  * gawk (gawk-3.1.5-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2)
  * lzma (lzma-4.43-MSYS-1.0.11-1-bin.tar.gz)
  * make (make-3.81-MSYS-1.0.11-2.tar.bz2)
  * MSYS 1.0.11 (MSYS-1.0.11-20090120-dll.tar.gz)
  * msysCore (msysCORE-1.0.11-20080826.tar.gz)
  * tar (tar-1.19.90-MSYS-1.0.11-2-bin.tar.gz)
  * textinfo (texinfo-4.11-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2)

 # Create a msys directory folder in _C:\msys\usr_.
 # Extract downloaded files in the created folder.
 # Run _pi.bat_ in postinstall directory. A console window will be opened.
  * Press _y_ to continue with the intallation.
  * Press _y_ to indicate that MinGW is intalled.
  * The MinGW intallation directory is _c:/MinGW_.
  * Press a key to finish with the intallation.
